title: I had to reset my pixel 4 and now the Android auto will not work with Mazda CX9 (2020)
content: I have  a pixel 4 that has been running Android auto on my Mazda CX 9 (2020) until i needed to reset my phone. Now it just tells me it can't connect because the car is in gear (it isn't). I have unloaded and loaded the app multiple times and does the same thing?
